title: AARYA Diamond Stud Earrings
materials: 9.51 diamond weight). Set with meticulously selected round brilliant cut diamonds with SI clarity and G-H color. Possesses the lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Delicate floral design with a central flower cluster and stylized leaf-like design with openwork filigree-inspired swirls. Features a prong setting to maximize diamond brilliance. The design seamlessly blends classic floral motifs with a contemporary open setting for a modern touch.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold and brilliant White Diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or to add a touch of elegance to special occasions like weddings
description: These earrings offer a timeless blend of classic floral design and contemporary styling. The dazzling diamonds, set in 18K gold and polished with Hyderabadi finesse, create a captivating sparkle. The open filigree detailing ensures comfortable wear while adding a unique touch of elegance.
